name: Atom - Periodic Table & Quizzes
description:
Learn the basics of chemistry doing the quizzes and using the periodic table.

FEATURES:
• Periodic table quiz
• Chemical valences quiz
• All the elements of the periodic table
• Atomic number, atomic mass, electronic configuration, electronegativity, oxidation states, bonding type, melting point, boiling point, density, year of discovery and valency
• Molar mass calculator

There will be more quizzes in the future!

screenshots.label: Periodic table with all the elements at your fingertips
